abstract.p: Description of authentic New Jersey Transit scale model train available from Lionel; photo (S)

block.p: If this particular New Jersey Transit train is late, you have no one to blame but yourself. It's made by Lionel; its route is in your rec room or basement, and punctuality is a personal matter. Last year, when Lionel introduced its first limited-edition set -- an engine and three passenger cars -- dealers couldn't keep up with the demand. Two thousand orders went unfilled.

If this particular New Jersey Transit train is late, you have no one to blame but yourself. It's made by Lionel; its route is in your rec room or basement, and punctuality is a personal matter. Last year, when Lionel introduced its first limited-edition set -- an engine and three passenger cars -- dealers couldn't keep up with the demand. Two thousand orders went unfilled.

Lionel is issuing a second set, with a locomotive like those used for rail riders. (The old one was the kind used in rail yards.) It should be available in late October, but here promptness is a good idea: it's suggested that those interested order now from Lionel dealers so they won't be left running for the train.
